product_name: Thule Pack n' Pedal Handlebar Basket
long_description: The versatile and stylish Thule Pack n' Pedal Handlebar Basket securely mounts to front or rear bike racks and delivers plenty of storage space for 2-wheeled grocery runs and everyday errands. Sized for 2 average-size grocery bags, this lightweight basket is designed to accommodate small and large items. Fits best on Thule racks (sold separately), but will work on virtually any bike rack. Quality design with aluminum accents is built to last. Attaches to bike rack decks and rails on the front or rear of the bike. Thule Pack n' Pedal Handelbar Basket is easy to install and remove with readily available tools.
short_description: The versatile and stylish Thule Pack n' Pedal Handlebar Basket securely mounts to front or rear bike racks and delivers plenty of storage space for 2-wheeled grocery runs and everyday errands.
